content.question: According to lines 2-4 (Non...armos), in which of the following ways is Marcellus characterized?

choices.label: Having a special connection with horses
The victim of an unlucky encounter in battle
A more effective foot soldier than equestrian

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12
